MathPlayer:
MathsJax wisna able tae set up MathsPlayer.

Gif MathsPlayer isna installed, ye need tae install it firstwhile.
Itherwise, yer securitie settins micht be preventin ActiveX
controls fae rinnin. Uise the Internet Opties eitem unner
the Tuilkist menu n select the Securitie tab, then press the
Custom Level button. Check that the settins fer
'Rin ActiveX Controls', n 'Binarie n screept behaviors'
ar enabled.

Currently ye will see mistak messages rather than
typeset mathematics
CantCreateXMLParser:
MathsJax canna cr√¶ft aen XML parser fer MathsML. Check that
the 'Screept ActiveX controls maurked safe fer screeptin' securitie
settin is enabled (uise the Internet Opties eitem in the Tuils menu, n select the Securitie panel, then press the Custom Level
button tae check this).

MathsML equations will no be able tae be processed bi MathsJax
MathMLSingleElement: MathsML maun be formed bi ae single element
MathMLRootElement: MathsML maun be formed bi ae <math> element, no $1
